titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals of International Women's Day.
A resolution supporting the goals of International Women's Day.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the goals of International Women's Day and recognizes that women's empowerment is inextricably linked to generating economic growth and self-reliance, sustainable peace and democracy, and inclusive security. The resolution also reaffirms a commitment to end discrimination and violence against women and girls and to pursue policies that guarantee fundamental human rights for women and girls worldwide.
